availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marion County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Catherine Turner. Father of Thomas J. Turner, Sybil A. Turner, Raymond Turner. Farmer in Marion County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Washington County.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marion County, District 1, p. 519.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, Curdsville, p. 46.
Find A Grave, "J. N. Turner (February 14, 1836-December 7, 1897)," Memorial #27698029, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/27698029 (accessed February 7, 2019).
